title: Curse Nightmare Party – Jagan Yousei ga Yuku VRMMO - Novel Updates
tags: Adventurers   Antihero Protagonist   Chat Rooms   Curses   Depictions of Cruelty   Dishonest Protagonist   Dragons   Dungeons   Eye Powers   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Gamers   Humanoid Protagonist   Immortals   Level System   Lost Civilizations   Masochistic Characters   MMORPG   Modern Day   Monsters   Multiple POV   Overpowered Protagonist   R-15   Sentient Objects   Strong to Stronger   Sword And Magic   Unique Weapon User   Virtual Reality   Weak to Strong
author: Kurikinoshita   Kurikishita   クリキノシタ   栗木下
description: Curse Nightmare Party is a VRMMO set in a world where there are grotesque creatures, curses, and demons who run rampant. The players are also cursed, taking on strange appearances. It's a dark fantasy game where you wear equipment enveloped in curses and battle. In such a world, a girl takes on the form of an ominous fairy and begins her adventure.>
